name: Giant Centipede
description: A long, multi-legged insect with a segmented body that moves quickly and stealthily.
memorable: Its venomous bite can paralyze its prey, making it a dangerous ambusher especially in groups.
goals: To ambush and subdue its prey using venom.
relations: Often encountered in dark, damp environments.
strengths: High agility and the ability to poison targets.
weaknesses: Low hit points and relatively low AC.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing damage and can inflict additional poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Venomous bite that can paralyze targets for 1 hour.
senses: Blindsight up to 30 feet allows it to detect nearby creatures without relying on sight.
skills: Notably low perception with a passive score of 8.
additional_information: Can burrow into the ground for stealth.
Can be dangerous when encountered in large swarms.
Low strength and intelligence limits its abilities in combat.
Weak constitution makes it susceptible to damage.
Surprisingly fast despite its low hit points.
test_queries: creature with paralyzing bite in swamps
agile insect that inflicts poison damage
small creature that lives in dark caves
fast insect that can climb and burrow
